ie.gmit.sw.ai.maze

Class InformedPathMarker

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.ai.maze.InformedPathMarker

  • public class InformedPathMarker
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to generate various informed (heuristic) search algorithms. Generates all moves from the player to the goal node. This can then be used to mark the path on the map up to N spaces. This class is used by the helper rats. Algorithms: basicHillClimber, steepestAscentHillClimber, bestFirstTraversator and beamTraversator.
    Author:
    Ronan
